personalInfo.residence: Needham, MA; plays out of Blue Hill CC (Canton, MA)

tourBios.otherInfo: Member of the Nationwide Tour from 1990-93 and 2000-05. Has made the cut in four of nine starts over the past two years, with a T25 at the Preferred Health Systems Wichita Open his best showing. Made the cut in four of 10 starts in 2005. Making his first start of the season notched a T9 at the Scholarship America Showdown. Rounds of 72-64-68-72 left him at 4-under 276, 10 shots behind winner Jason Gore. Only other top-25 was T21 at the Price Cutter Charity Championship. Made the cut in 12 of 23 starts on the 2004 Nationwide Tour. Cracked the top 25 on two occasions, including a season-best, seventh-place showing at the Rheem Classic and T22 at the Lake Erie Charity Classic. Snuck into the top 100, claiming the No. 100 spot, with $43,357 in earnings. Made the cut in half of his 20 starts in 2003, with his only top-10 coming at the Dayton Open where he posted four rounds in the 60s. His T4 at Dayton was his highest finish since winning the 2000 Utah Classic. Made the cut in seven of 17 starts in 2002, with his only top-10 coming at the Price Cutter Charity Championship. Second-round 63 helped him to a T8 finish in Springfield. Earned his first career win at the 2000 Utah Classic, where he opened with a 64 to trail leader Mark Hensby by one shot. Second-round 66 gave him a four-stroke lead at the halfway mark. Third-round 71 cut his lead to two over Bo Van Pelt. Closing 4-under 68 pushed him to two-stroke win over John Riegger. Season total of $159,423 was more than he had earned in previous 112 starts on Nationwide Tour. Ranked No. 2 in Scoring Average (70.16) and No. 3 in Putting (1.735). Previous best year came in 1992 when he finished 21st on the money list, making the cut in 20 of 30 events, with six top-10 finishes. Winner of seven Hooters Tour events from 1995-99. Won the Northeast Open in 1986-87, the New England Open in 1986-87, the Massachusetts Open in 1989 and 1993, the Maine Open in 1989 and the New Hampshire Open in 1989. Played the Southern Africa Tour in 1988-89.

dyn.dynResults: His best finish on the Web.com Tour was 1st in 2000 at the BUY.COM Utah Classic.
